taskList.title: Folder Structure and tech stack chosing vvv
taskList.description: Discuss the Folder structure for the front end and chose which technology stack to use. For example if you are chosing react then discuss state management, UI library, theme management e.t.c

taskList.title: Installing Required Packages
taskList.description: Once you are done with chosing the tech stack install the required dependancies and dry run the app testing the functionalities of the packages you installed
